name: WavesFighters
description:
Welcome to WavesFighters, the arena of the 22nd century!

Your goal is to reduce the life gauge of your opponent through the beat and waves of your instrument. Each player has 3 life points.

You can send 3 different types of waves, but you cannot send more than 1 wave per second. The slower the wave, the higher the number of bounces.

The first player to score 3 points wins the duel.

This game was made as part of the Global Game Jam 2017 @ ICAN (Paris) on the theme "Waves". See jam entry here.

Note that the 2nd screenshot contains a level that has been removed from the final build (we didn't like anechoic walls).
